org.sensorhub.api.security

Interface IUserRole

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IUserPermissions
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicSecurityRealmConfig.RoleConfig

    public interface IUserRole
extends IUserPermissions

    Base interface for object representing roles in the security API.
    Roles are sets of allowed and denied permissions that are associated to users

    Since:
    Aug 22, 2016
    Author:
    Alex Robin
